collection_holder_name: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books, and Manuscripts
pageContext.collection_title: Marian Anderson Collection of Miscellaneous Sound Recordings
pageContext.collection_description: Most of the collection is not from radio programs, but it does include radio programs about Marian Anderson and a radio program of recited poetry about Anderson recorded in 1960 for Mason City, Iowa radio station KGLO.
